summary: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.
cast: Nova Pilbeam|Derrick De Marney|Percy Marmont|Edward Rigby|Mary Clare|John Longden|George Curzon|Basil Radford|Pamela Carme|George Merritt|J.H. Roberts|Jerry Verno|H.F. Maltby|John Miller|Frank Atkinson|Clive Baxter|Pamela Bevan|Albert Chevalier|Syd Crossley|William Fazan|Gerry Fitzgerald|Pat Fitzpatrick|Richard George|Alfred Hitchcock|Mike Johnson|Anna Konstam|Fred O'Donovan|Frederick Piper|Ian Selby|Bill Shine|Peggy Simpson|George Spence|Torin Thatcher|Peter Thompson|Beatrice Varley|Jack Vyvyan|Humberston Wright
title: Inocencia y juventud
